mapper.sql: SELECT t1.*, ( SELECT t2.`name` FROM sys_dictionary t2 WHERE t2.`parent_code` ='ROOT_KJPT_ZLZL' AND t2.`code`=t1.`patent_type` ) patent_type_str FROM zjk_patent t1
mapper.update: update zjk_achievement set del_status = '1' where expert_id = #{expertId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update zjk_achievement set del_status = '1' where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from zjk_achievement t where expert_id = #{expertId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
